title: To save her soul
brief_description: A moral tale of a choir singer and an enthusiastic admirer from the clergy who is intent on saving the young singer’s soul. Cast includes Mary Pickford, Arthur V. Johnson, Caroline Harris, Mack Sennett. Silent film with English intertitles.
